titleStmt.title: Anno Regni Caroli II. Regis Scotiæ Angliæ Franciæ & Hiberniæ duodecimo at the Parliament begun at Westminster, the five and twentieth day of April, Anno Dom. 1660, in the twelfth year of the reign of our most Gracious Soveraign Lord Charles, by the grace of God, of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, King, defender of the faith, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Laws, statutes, etc.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker,

notesStmt.note: At bottom of t.p. : "And reprinted at Dublin by William Bladen, Anno Dom. 1660."
Imperfect: pages stained and tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
